class.name: DiscordppUserMessageSummary
class.description:
Represents a summary of a DM conversation with a user.
Reference: [url]https://discord.com/developers/docs/social-sdk/classdiscordpp_1_1UserMessageSummary.html[/url]

method.name: LastMessageId
method.description: Returns the ID of the last message sent in the DM conversation.

method.name: UserId
method.description: Returns the ID of the other user in the DM conversation.
